ygData.subject: RE: Mipmapping question
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL that s good. Hey so what is it you do again . I don t know lets ask..... Of course this time frame of Tuesday may be pushed do to the, moving of pa.....
ygData.messageBody:
LOL that's good. "Hey so what is it you do again".

"I don't know lets ask....."

Of course this time frame of Tuesday may be pushed do to the, moving of
pa..... Do to the unexpected errors that seem to arise on Tuesday mornings.
-----Original Message-----
From: Dicey [mailto:shonn@...]
Sent: Friday, February 25, 2000 1:20 PM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Mipmapping question


From: "Dicey" <shonn@...>


The best time to reach our representatives would be Tuesday morning.
Patch time will be...um, I mean they will be available for about 6 hours.

I want to be the guy that nobody knows what his job is.

-----Original Message-----
From: Cory Burns [mailto:coryb@...]
Sent: Friday, February 25, 2000 11:06 AM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Mipmapping question


From: "Cory Burns" <coryb@...>


Ok you got "that Guy". I'll be the Guy that goes "I don't know
this lets call........." hehe.

Also
Answering Service: Thank you for calling Everquest ISP all our
representatives are busy right now. We have members out some
are dealing with a Cazic Thule and we have other that are trying
to fix an OOT problem, please call back later and someone,
may be available
